hanzi-su-wiki:
創

Значения

Делать, создавать; рана; творческий

Мнемоника

Искажено. Амбар 倉 как символ сохранения урожая, делать запас зерна и защищать 刂 его от вредителей.

Варианты

创, 刅, 戧
purpleculture_pinyin:
chuàng
to begin; to initiate; to inaugurate; to start; to create
начать; инициировать; открыть; начать; создавать

chuāng
a wound; cut; injury; trauma
рана; резать; травма, повреждение; травма
rtega_mnemonic:
創創RS
创创		establish, create, knife cut
  • knife 刂 cutting produce to establish provisions for a warehouse 倉/仓 originally coming from the fields.
刅
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 创)
Pictophonetic: 倉 indicates the sound; 刂 (knife) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
創造 [ chuàng zào ]: to create; to bring about; to produce; to set (a record)
創作 [ chuàng zuò ]: to create; to produce; to write; creative work; creation; Classifiers: 个
創新 [ chuàng xīn ]: innovation; to bring forth new ideas; to blaze new trails
創建 [ chuàng jiàn ]: to found; to establish
創業 [ chuàng yè ]: to begin an undertaking; to start a major task; to initiate; to venture; venture; entrepreneurship
創傷 [ chuāng shāng ]: wound; injury; trauma
創口 [ chuāng kǒu ]: a wound; a cut
創痛 [ chuāng tòng ]: pain from a wound
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 倉 [ cāng ] granary, barn; cabin, berth
    • 刂 [ dāo ] knife
heisig_chinese_memo: Back in the day the people were so excited to get hold of the Sega genesis they initiated looting sprees at the storehouse with sabers.
heisig_constituent: genesis, godown, meeting, single gate, umbrella, stable door, mouth, sword, sabre, saber
Keyword_KANJIDIC: genesis, wound, injury, hurt, start, originate
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: генезис, ранения, травмы, боль, начать, происходят
koohiiStory1: Back in the day the people were so excited to get hold of the Sega genesis they looted the godown with sabers.
koohiiStory2: I prefer to have girls Godown on my sabre to prevent unwanted GENESIS of babies............創造　そうぞう (creation).
kunYomi: つく.る、はじ.める、きず、けず.しける
jp_example_words:
創刊(そうかん): launching (e.g. newspaper), first issue
創作(そうさく): production, literary creation, work
創造(そうぞう): creation
創立(そうりつ): establishment, founding, organization
独創(どくそう): originality
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In your warehouse you use your knife to create. You keep old pieces of wood in your warehouse, and you use your knife to carve them into new things that only you could create.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: What do you create in your warehouse? Picture all the different things you could create in your mind.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When you create it's good for your soul (そう). It's so freeing, in fact, that when you get really into your creating, sometimes you'd swear your soul was floating a little bit outside of your body. But every time you notice, it sinks back down. Hmm.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: When you create something your soul is happy! It's good for you, you know?
Ru_Meaning: genesis, wound, injury, hurt, start, originate
Ru_Words:
創造そうぞう
  • творчество, созидание
    • warodai
    創立そうりつ
  • основание, учреждение чего-либо
    • 創作そうさく
  • творчество (литературное); писательская деятельность; литературный труд;
  • оригинальное произведение (литературное)
    • warodai
    独創どくそう
  • оригинальность, своеобразие, самобытность
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 刈 (косить), 口 (рот)
Ru_trainchinese:
chuàng: (глаг) начинать, создавать, основывать
chuāng: (сущ) рана, травма
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a storehouse (倉) of swords (刂) is your creation
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In anti-gun countries like the U.K. entry into a storehouse doesn't require passing the armed gunmen, but rather an initiation ceremony using a saber to knight the visitor and thus initiate entry.  It's a one time ceremony so don't worry about next time.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Chuang " is " creating " the beginning of the text, like a knife chop Jing thorn-shaped, because the process is susceptible to trauma, hence the meaning of the trauma. After adding " well " as a sound symbol, written "刱". See also "刱", " Jing ". In the late Warring States Period, Zhongshan King's Fanghu had a starting point of "立", and from the shape of " blade ", it was also pronounced " chuang ".

" Chuang " from the sound of " sword " and " cang ", "Shuowen" thinks that it is the or form of "刅". The original meaning is trauma. "Shuowen": "刅, injury. From the blade from one. Chuang, or from the knife, the sound of the warehouse." Such as "Zhan Guo Ce. Yan Ce III: "The King of Qin re-attacked Ke and was wounded by eight." "Huainanzi. "Tao Ying": "Whoever does not have the beast, is afraid that he will be small; if he has obtained it, he is afraid of hurting the flesh."

" Chuang " by extension means injury and damage. "Release name. "Release Diseases": "Injuries, destroys, destroys the body and causes injuries." Such as "Han Shu. "Xue Xuan Zhu Bo Biography": "Xuan Zi Kuang is the right Cao Shi Lang. He has heard of his words and visited Yang Ming. He wants to create a salty face, so that he will not occupy the position." Yan Shi Gu's note: "Creation means injury."

" Creation " means to create and create. "Shuowen": "Qi, create law and karma. From the well, sing. Read Ruo Chuang." "Guang Ya. Shi Gu Yi: "Foundation, Beginning." Such as "Mencius. "The Second King of Lianghui": "A gentleman starts his own business for success." Zhuge Liang of the Three Kingdoms Shu Zhuge Liang "Teacher List": "The first emperor's entrepreneurship is not halfway but the middle way collapses."

" Creation " extends from the meaning of creation to mean writing and creating. Such as "Lun Heng. Super Strange": "Confucius got "Historical Records" to make "Spring and Autumn", and its creative ideas, slandered and praised. Those who no longer use "Historical Records" will have their own thoughts in their minds." "Yinci": "Sun Shuran created "Erya Yinyi", which is a unique irony in the late Han Dynasty."

" Chuang " also means punishment and punishment. Such as "Shang Shu. "Yi Ji" "It is like time to create", "Kong Chuan": "Creation, punish also." Kong Yingda Shu: "Punish the evil of Dan Zhu." Another example is "Yan Zi Chun Qiu. Neipian Questions 2": "The body has nothing to blame and does nothing to create. It can be said to be proud."

" Chuang " is commonly used as " sore ", which means skin ulcers. "Zhengzitong. "Sword Department": "Wounds and sores are also sores." Such as "Book of Rites. "Qu Li Shang": "In the funeral ceremony, there is a wound on the head and a bath, and a sore on the body is a bath." "Lun Heng. "Fortunately Ou": "The accumulation of qi will cause carbuncle, ulceration will result in gangrene wounds, bleeding and pus."
humanum_short_description_en: " Chuang " is " creating " the beginning of the text, like a knife chop Jing thorn-shaped, because the process is susceptible to trauma, hence the meaning of the trauma. After adding " well " as a sound symbol, written "刱". " Chuang " from the sound of " sword " and " cang ", "Shuowen" thinks that it is the or form of "刅". The original meaning is trauma.
humanum_full_description:
「刅」是「創」的初文，象以刀斫荊刺之形，因過程中易受創傷，因而有創傷之意。後加上「井」作聲符，寫作「刱」。參見「刱」、「荊」。戰國晚期中山王方壺有從「立」，從「刃」的字形，也讀為「創」。

　　「創」從「刀」，「倉」聲，《說文》以為是「刅」的或體。本義是創傷。《說文》：「刅，傷也。从刃从一。創，或从刀，倉聲。」如《戰國策．燕策三》：「秦王復擊軻，被八創。」《淮南子．道應》：「夫未得獸者，惟恐其創之小也；已得之，唯恐傷肉之多也。」

　　「創」引申表示傷害、損害。《釋名．釋疾病》：「創，戕也，戕毀體使傷也。」如《漢書．薛宣朱博傳》：「宣子況為右曹侍郎，數聞其語，賕客楊明，欲令創咸面目，使不居位。」顏師古注：「創謂傷之也。」

　　「創」表示始造、創造。《說文》：「刱，造法刱業也。从井，刅聲。讀若創。」《廣雅．釋詁一》：「創，始也。」如《孟子．梁惠王下》：「君子創業垂統，為可繼也。」三國蜀諸葛亮〈出師表〉：「先帝創業未半而中道崩殂。」

　　「創」從創造義引申表示撰作、創作。如《論衡．超奇》：「孔子得《史記》以作《春秋》，及其立義創意，襃貶賞誅，不復因《史記》者，眇思自出於胸中也。」《顏氏家訓．音辭》：「孫叔然創《爾雅音義》，是漢末人獨知反語。」

　　「創」亦表示懲戒、懲治。如《尚書．益稷》「予創若時」，《孔傳》：「創，懲也。」孔穎達疏：「懲丹朱之惡。」又如《晏子春秋．內篇問下》：「身無所咎，行無所創，可謂榮矣。」

　　「創」通作「瘡」，表示皮膚潰瘍。《正字通．刀部》：「創，又瘍也，通作瘡。」如《禮記．曲禮上》：「居喪之禮，頭有創則沐，身有瘍則浴。」《論衡．幸偶》：「氣結閼積，聚為癰，潰為疽創，流血出膿。」
humanum_short_description: 「刅」是「創」的初文，象以刀斫荊刺之形，因過程中易受創傷，因而有創傷之意。後加上「井」作聲符，寫作「刱」。「創」從「刀」，「倉」聲，《說文》以為是「刅」的或體。本義是創傷。

創刊(そうかん): launching (e.g. newspaper), first issue
創作(そうさく): production, literary creation, work
創造(そうぞう): creation
創立(そうりつ): establishment, founding, organization
独創(どくそう): originality

「 刅 」是「 創 」的初文，象以刀斫荊刺之形，因過程中易受創傷，因而有創傷之意。後加上「 井 」作聲符，寫作「 刱 」。參見「 刱 」、「 荊 」。戰國晚期中山王方壺有從「 立 」，從「 刃 」的字形，也讀為「 創 」。 「 創 」從「 刀 」，「 倉 」聲，《說文》以為是「 刅 」的或體。本義是創傷。《說文》：「刅，傷也。从刃从一。創，或从刀，倉聲。」如《戰國策．燕策三》：「秦王復擊軻，被八創。」《淮南子．道應》：「夫未得獸者，惟恐其創之小也；已得之，唯恐傷肉之多也。」 「 創 」引申表示傷害、損害。《釋名．釋疾病》：「創，戕也，戕毀體使傷也。」如《漢書．薛宣朱博傳》：「宣子況為右曹侍郎，數聞其語，賕客楊明，欲令創咸面目，使不居位。」顏師古注：「創謂傷之也。」 「 創 」表示始造、創造。《說文》：「刱，造法刱業也。从井，刅聲。讀若創。」《廣雅．釋詁一》：「創，始也。」如《孟子．梁惠王下》：「君子創業垂統，為可繼也。」三國蜀諸葛亮〈出師表〉：「先帝創業未半而中道崩殂。」 「 創 」從創造義引申表示撰作、創作。如《論衡．超奇》：「孔子得《史記》以作《春秋》，及其立義創意，襃貶賞誅，不復因《史記》者，眇思自出於胸中也。」《顏氏家訓．音辭》：「孫叔然創《爾雅音義》，是漢末人獨知反語。」 「 創 」亦表示懲戒、懲治。如《尚書．益稷》「予創若時」，《孔傳》：「創，懲也。」孔穎達疏：「懲丹朱之惡。」又如《晏子春秋．內篇問下》：「身無所咎，行無所創，可謂榮矣。」 「 創 」通作「 瘡 」，表示皮膚潰瘍。《正字通．刀部》：「創，又瘍也，通作瘡。」如《禮記．曲禮上》：「居喪之禮，頭有創則沐，身有瘍則浴。」《論衡．幸偶》：「氣結閼積，聚為癰，潰為疽創，流血出膿。」

創字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuāng］
［《廣韻》初良切，平陽，初。］
“戧1”的今字。“创1”的繁体字。
(1)创伤。
(2)伤害。
(3)砍；劈。
(4)通“瘡”。
[②]［chuàng］
［《廣韻》初亮切，去漾，初。］
亦作“刱1”。亦作“剏1”。亦作“剙1”。“创2”的繁体字。
(1)始造。
(2)初始。
(3)建造。
(4)撰写；创作。
(5)超出；扩大。
(6)惩治；警戒。
(7)同“闖”。多见于俗文学作品。
(8)通“愴”。参见“創2楚”。

創字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　創； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页143第02
〔古文〕戧??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】初良切【正韻】初莊切，?音瘡。【說文】傷也。本作刅，或作創。【徐曰】此正刀創字。言刃所傷也。【前漢·曹參傳】身被七十創。又【前漢·班固敘傳】禮義是創。【註】師古曰：創，始造之，音初良反。又【唐韻】初亮切，瘡去聲。始也，造也。【孟子】創業垂統。又傷也。【前漢·匈奴傳】人民創艾戰?。又懲也。【書·益稷】子創若時。【註】禹自言懲丹朱之惡，不敢慢遊也。又【集韻】千羊切，音鏘。瑲，或作創。瑲瑲，玉聲。又【玉篇】古文瘡字。【禮·曲禮】頭有創，則沐。餘詳疒部十畫。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuāng］
["Guangyun" Chu Liangqi, Pingyang, Chu. ]
The present character of "戗1". Traditional characters of "创1".
(1) Trauma.
(2) Harm.
(3) Cut; split.
(4) Through "sore".
[②]［chuàng］
["Guangyun" first bright cut, go to Yang, early. ]
Also known as "刱1". Also known as "剏1". Also known as "剙1". Traditional characters of "创2".
(1) Begin to make.
(2) Initial.
(3) Construction.
(4) Compose; create.
(5) Exceed; expand.
(6) Punishment; vigilance.
(7) Same as "Chuang". Seen in popular literature.
(8) Through "Yi". See "Chuang 2 Chu".

Name meaning
Nothing.
chuàng, chuāng
вм. 创
Radicals: 倉, 刂  (warehouse, knife)
Meaning Mnemonic
In your warehouse you use your knife to create. You keep old pieces of wood in your warehouse, and you use your knife to carve them into new things that only you could create.
What do you create in your warehouse? Picture all the different things you could create in your mind.
Reading Mnemonic
When you create it's good for your soul (そう). It's so freeing, in fact, that when you get really into your creating, sometimes you'd swear your soul was floating a little bit outside of your body. But every time you notice, it sinks back down. Hmm.
When you create something your soul is happy! It's good for you, you know?
